pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

content.raw: I think that for a gazebo developer workflow would fit well this last option, when the targets are configured but not built by default, that was the goal of the PR. I'm not sure what would be the role of `BUILD_TESTING` in this scenario but probably use it to control just the build (the configure will remain mandatory) would honor, at least partially, the original goal of it.
